internal.content:
--- title: License --- - Subscription Term or Perpetual License is used via App Points (similar to tokens) in MAS. - Contact IBM account team regarding App Points and MAS license file. - Customer buys a pool of App Points. - The same App Points can be applied to any application in MAS. - Administering License and Apppoints: https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/mas84/8.4.0?topic=administering-license-apppoints

- There are four user types/entitlements available: - Limited - Base - Premium - Self Service

- There are four user types/entitlements available: - Limited - Base - Premium - Self Service
